ingredients.ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, at room temperature
¼ cup sweetened dried cranberries (such as Craisins®)

cookingTips: Bring cream cheese to room temperature for smooth, even spreading without tearing the wraps
Layer turkey slices slightly overlapping to ensure full coverage on each wrap
Wrap tightly in plastic wrap and refrigerate before slicing for clean, professional-looking pinwheels
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help me assemble elegant cranberry-spinach turkey roll-ups that are perfect for make-ahead lunches or party platters.
